requirements: Direct deposit $1,500 (using at least 2 direct deposits) within 90 days of accont opening
Transfer brokerage account with at least $2,000 in assets
Make a minimum of $500 in direct deposits or ACH deposits into the checking account each month for three months.
Use code GET200 when opening checking account. Direct deposit at least $1,500 within 90 days

Open a new 360 Performance Savings account with promo code FALL23. Deposit $20,000+ of external funds during the 15-day Initial Funding Period after opening your account and hold those deposits for 90 additional days
Fund account with $2,000, make a minimum of 2 trades of at least $25, maintain the $2,000 balance for 90 days
Fund with $500 or more. Maintain that balance for 3 months at least, will receive bonus in 2 $75 deposits
